location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 399: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell forwards copies of his letters to His Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil CB, Her Majesty's Minister at the Court of Persia. The letters (nos. 365 and 382-384) are not included here, although nos. 382-384 do appear earlier in the file (see ff.162-168, ff.169-177 and ff.178-179 respectively).
